pacman.controller

Class FakeMazeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.controller.FakeMazeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacmanMazeController

    public class FakeMazeController
extends java.lang.Object
implements PacmanMazeController
    Contains a fake controller which does nothing in every action, mainly for testing purposes.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • agentVisit

        public void agentVisit(AbstractAgent agent,
                       int x,
                       int y)
        Gets called when an agent (pacman/ghost) visits a block. It checks if the pacman meets a food (then earn scores), pellet (then earn scores and enter "ghost buster" mode), a scared ghost (then earn scores and reset the ghost), or a normal ghost (then dies). After that it updates the scores and check if game is won.
        Specified by:
        agentVisit in interface PacmanMazeController
        Parameters:
        agent - the agent of the move
        x - the current x coordinate of agent
        y - the current y coordinate of agent

      • removeAgent

        public void removeAgent(AbstractAgent agent)
        Removes an agent from the game.
        Specified by:
        removeAgent in interface PacmanMazeController
        Parameters:
        agent - the agent that is about to be removed.

      • notifyDirectionChange

        public void notifyDirectionChange(Direction d,
                                  AbstractAgent agent,
                                  int x,
                                  int y)
        Notifies the direction change (actions) of an agent.
        Specified by:
        notifyDirectionChange in interface PacmanMazeController
        Parameters:
        d - the new direction of the agent
        agent - the agent that is changing
        x - the x coordinate in the maze
        y - the y coordinate in the maze
